recipe.title: Quinoa Stew

inspiration.text: Slow Cooker Sweet Potato Quinoa Stew - Sweet Peas and Saffron

recipe.ingredients: 4 cups sweet potatoes cubed 341mL can of corn 540mL can black beans drained and rinsed 540mL can diced tomatoes including juices 1 red onion diced 1 tsp salt 2 tbsp cumin 1 tbsp chili powder 4-5 cups stock ⅔ cup uncooked quinoa 2 tbsp lime juice ¼ tsp salt

method.step: Place all ingredients in the base of a 5 quart slow cooker. This makes a big batch and your slow cooker will be quite full!
Add the lime juice and additional salt if necessary. Serve with bread, cheese or yogurt.
Place all ingredients except the stock and quinoa in a gallon-sized heavy duty freezer bag. Squeeze out as much air as possible, then freeze for up to 3 months.
Thaw completely before placing in a 5 quart slow cooker with the stock and quinoa, and cook on low for 6 hours.
